actions.text: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources. Ordered to be reported with an amendment favorably.
Committee on Energy and Natural Resources. Reported by Senator Murkowski under authority of the order of the Senate of 07/26/2000 with amendments. With written report No. 106-374.
Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 752.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on National Parks, Historic Preservation and Recreation

official_title: A bill to authorize the addition of certain parcels to the Effigy Mounds National Monument, Iowa.
short_title: Effigy Mounds National Monument Additions Act

summary.text: Effigy Mounds National Monument Additions Act - Allows the Secretary of the Interior to acquire by purchase, from willing sellers only, specified parcels of land in Allamakee and Clayton Counties, Iowa, for addition to the Effigy Mounds National Monument. Modifies the boundary of the Monument to include such parcels.Authorizes appropriations.

titles.title: Effigy Mounds National Monument Additions Act
Effigy Mounds National Monument Additions Act
A bill to authorize the addition of certain parcels to the Effigy Mounds National Monument, Iowa.
